supplier_of: pet folding boxes | plastics - packaging | shaker | plastic packaging for deli goods | customised plastic packaging | plastic pots | packaging materials for the food industry | plastic packaging materials for the food industry | round pots | lard pots | octagonal pots | packaging with side seal | rectangular pots | packaging with tamper-evident closure | trays for aspic products
information: Wächter & Co. GmbH is one of the leading manufacturers of plastic packaging for the food industry. We have been producing plastic packaging for more than 50 years, and have been BRCGS-certified since July 2016. Our head office is in Leopoldshöhe (near Bielefeld). We produce our own foil, and have modern thermoforming and printing machines. As a medium-sized company, we place particular value on individuality, flexibility and quality. Our strengths are: Consistent product quality, a wide range, range of materials for packaging (PP, PS, PET and PVC), special packaging, customised labelling of boxes, printing of small batches, quickly accessible and competent contact partners, short delivery time, quick processing of requests, disposal cost billing as a service, support with in-house exhibitions and advertising measures, production in line with BRCGS standards.
keywords: Plastics - packaging, Plastic packaging for deli goods, Customised plastic packaging, plastic pots, Packaging materials for the food industry, Plastic packaging materials for the food industry, Round pots, Lard pots, Octagonal pots, Packaging with side seal
